content:
I apologize for the confusion. Here's the expanded table with additional queries and companies:

| Job Title | # of Users (LinkedIn) | # of Users (Twitter) | Potential Queries | Companies |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Marketing Manager | 1,500,000+ | 1,200,000+ | "Best survey platform for marketing research", "Survey software for marketing campaigns", "Survey tools for customer feedback" | Qualtrics, SurveyMonkey, SurveySparrow |
| Research Analyst | 500,000+ | 250,000+ | "Survey tools for data analysis", "Top survey platforms for research studies", "Online survey software for market research" | Qualtrics, SurveyMonkey, SurveySparrow |
| Customer Experience Manager | 1,200,000+ | 500,000+ | "Customer feedback survey platforms", "Best survey software for measuring customer satisfaction", "Top survey tools for customer service" | Qualtrics, SurveyMonkey, SurveySparrow |
| HR Manager | 2,000,000+ | 500,000+ | "Online survey tools for employee feedback", "Best survey software for HR departments", "Top survey platforms for performance appraisal" | Qualtrics, SurveyMonkey, SurveySparrow |
| Product Manager | 1,500,000+ | 1,000,000+ | "Survey software for product development", "Product feedback survey platforms", "Top survey tools for market research" | Qualtrics, SurveyMonkey, SurveySparrow |
| Small Business Owner | 1,000,000+ | 500,000+ | "Affordable survey software for small businesses", "Top survey platforms for startups", "Easy-to-use survey tools for entrepreneurs" | Qualtrics, SurveyMonkey, SurveySparrow |
| Sales Manager | 2,000,000+ | 1,500,000+ | "Sales feedback survey software", "Best survey tools for customer relationship management", "Top survey platforms for sales analytics" | Qualtrics, SurveyMonkey, SurveySparrow |
| UX Designer | 2,500,000+ | 1,000,000+ | "User experience survey tools", "Best survey software for usability testing", "Top survey platforms for UX research" | Qualtrics, SurveyMonkey, SurveySparrow |
| Event Coordinator | 1,000,000+ | 500,000+ | "Event feedback survey platforms", "Top survey tools for event planning", "Online survey software for event management" | SurveyMonkey, SurveyGizmo, Google Forms |
| Non-Profit Director | 500,000+ | 250,000+ | "Survey software for non-profits", "Top survey platforms for fundraising", "Online survey tools for measuring social impact" | Qualtrics, SurveyMonkey, SurveySparrow |

Note: The numbers provided for LinkedIn and Twitter users are estimates and are subject to change.
